title: Requirement Analysis
description: This stage entails gathering detailed information, conducting thorough research, and closely examining the business idea, goals, and objectives. It also includes formulating a development strategy and outlining the different phases of the development process.

title: Wireframing & Design
description: The design stage is crucial and requires close collaboration with the client through various techniques, including wireframing and prototyping. It involves brainstorming sessions, creating multiple mock-ups, and employing various methods to develop the optimal interface that effectively integrates the business logic.

title: Programming & Development
description: This stage includes selecting an appropriate tech stack and incorporating advanced technologies when necessary. The project is divided into modules, with each one developed based on priority using a proven methodology, ensuring regular updates are provided at predefined intervals.

title: Testing & Debugging
description: The testing process occurs at every stage of the project and is conducted thoroughly upon its completion. This includes both manual and automated testing, utilizing various testing software to ensure comprehensive coverage.

title: Deployment & Maintenance
description: The project is released following acceptance testing, ensuring it meets all requirements and is free from bugs. This phase also includes checking for performance issues. Post-release, the software is supported through maintenance tasks such as upgrades, security updates, functionality modifications, and more.
